content.html: general panic aside, would strongly encourage ppl to maintain an alternative platform just in case, but to not abandon ship entirely many of us depend on the varied demographic of twt users to make a living; a mass exodus will only harm small businesses, not a multi billionaire
content.value:
general panic aside, would strongly encourage ppl to maintain an alternative platform just in case, but to not abandon ship entirely

many of us depend on the varied demographic of twt users to make a living; a mass exodus will only harm small businesses, not a multi billionaire
